DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate immune response reactogenicity H5N1 vaccination adult age 18 year ( part tetravalent vaccine )
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Two Doses Tetravalent Influenza Vaccine Adults Aged 18 Years Above
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject ( age 18 year ) sign informed consent form Any acute chronic illness Receipt seasonal influenza vaccine current season 2007/2008 Known suspect impairment/alteration immune function Receipt another vaccine within 3 week prior Visit 1 plan vaccination within 3 week follow last study vaccination Any serious disease Hypersensitivity egg , chicken protein , chicken feather , influenza viral protein , neomycin kanamycin component study vaccine Receipt blood , blood product immunoglobulins 3 month prior vaccination
